Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1958...
Earned first career win on 4/17/1958...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1958, going 2-0, 0.72...
Had first career hit on 5/4/1958, off Jack Hazley (SYR)...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Gashouse on 5/12/1958 (Going to PIL: P B. Johns. Going to GHG: P R. Rigsby)...
Injured on 8/29/1958 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1958, going 13-5, 2.32 ERA...
Injured on 4/1/1962 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/15/1962 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/10/1963 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/20/1964 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Traded from Gashouse to Toledo on 7/7/1966 (Going to GHG: P J. Christian. Going to TOL: P R. Rigsby, P D. Henry)...
Injured on 7/14/1971 with a Spasms Back, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 4/16/1972 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Boston (FBA) on 9/18/1972, striking out 7...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/4/1974 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1976, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1977, going 5-0, 0.51...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Plum Grove on 9/15/1977, striking out 5...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1980, winning one game with a 0.59 ERA...
Hit first career homerun on 9/25/1980, off Nathan Burdge (Mal)...
Injured on 6/2/1981 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 7-8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 4/16/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $3,120,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1983, winning 2 games with a 0.57 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1983, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
